"Find Sighx's Shiny Soul!":
"Hi! I'm Sighx, the golden Cast!
I'm always thinking of new ways to
shine so I can share them with everyone.
I'm not just talking about gold...
Even your soul can shine!
I'm looking for a stone called Brightsoul
Ore; some call it Shiny Soul. Could you
find me some? I can use it to come up
with even more ways to shine!
※Target Lv.1+ Quartz Dragon"

"Ability Success Rate +45%
※1 per account, given upon completion."
